price: Enti nokorε no sii pi, na deε na wͻyε no yεε kwa;
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
